website_summaries.verdict: A modern dining table with plenty of space for families or large groups. Comes in several different colors and styles to match your home.
pros: Solid construction makes for a quick and easy assembly process
Very durable for homes with pets and young children
cons: Table design makes it impossible to place seats on the ends

customer_reviews.title: Solid desk for the price. Simple setup.
customer_reviews.text: This desk is good quality for the price. I got the smaller 47" size, and it's enough space for my work from home needs. The setup took me under 15 minutes - all the predrilled holes aligned nicely. There were two large scratches on the side leg on arrival, but it wasn't enough to warrant a full replacement and Amazon partially refunded me for the damage. The desk wobbles just barely on thick carpet. The weight of the wood top has a nice heft.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L

customer_reviews.title: heavy in a good way. Plain looking but not in a bad ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy in a good way. Plain looking but not in a bad way. Using it as a desk. Extremely easy to assemble, unwrapping the plastic covering the legs and opening the box took longer than assembly. I used a cordless screwdriver hex bit which made it even faster. I feel the table is maybe an inch or two too high but it seems OK. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Smart rat

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Spacious and aestically pleasing. The top is SOLID. I don’t think you’ll find a better desk for the price! Great packaging during shipping and very easy to put together. I bought it with the Amazon basics low back chair and my computer is a 21.5” for sizing reference.
customer_reviews.author: IZ

customer_reviews.title: this is probably my best amazon purchase - a real steal
customer_reviews.text: this is probably my best amazon purchase - a real steal! the build quality is great, the table is very stable because of the all around metal frame, but it still looks light and modern and all this was for less than half a similar ikea table. after having too many ikea units, the packing of this particular table was amazing, i was really blown away by the packing quality and the assembly instructions that were so well prepared. I am so happy I got this table! <3
customer_reviews.author: YLO

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble, comes with all necessary tools to assemble as well! This is the light brown and white frame version. :) EXTREMELY STURDY and delivered rapidly! Don’t hesitate buying!
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I tend to give 5 stars to most all products on Amazon, so to get a 1 star means something. Do not buy this desk, unless you're a gambler and want to roll the dice. 2 major problems with this desk: 1) metal parts did not easily fit together, and had to be forced together at great effort, and 2) there's a huge gash on the edge of the top of the desk! If I knew this is what I'd get, I wouldn't have paid even $20 for it. Who wants the trouble, and even worse, the forever reminder of the gash? I'll have to look at that gash every time I'm at the desk. Get a different desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk for Setup
customer_reviews.text: Prefect space and best desk for the money. Love the quality too
customer_reviews.author: Ana Carrera

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not wobbly... people are sourpusses.... The box was all dinged up, but they did a GREAT job of packing it tight. No dings or scratches. Easy to assemble.... dont listen to negative reviews, anything online is a gamble.... dont like it? Go pay 300$ for the same table at officemax
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price good
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It has come in three days after I ordered. I got shocked becuase I live in Hawaii. It was so fast. Good quality with this price.
customer_reviews.author: Ulziibayar

customer_reviews.title: Simple to set up
customer_reviews.text: I needed a desk for my home office area, and was looking for something easy to set up that wouldn't look cumbersome. This table fits the bill. Very simple to put together, and the design is nice and minimal. Elegant in its simplicity, but also big enough to fit two monitors and a docking station for a laptop. I do have to say, as someone who is 5'3", the table is a little too high for comfort when the keyboard is placed on top. I had to adjusted my desk chair higher, which means having to get a foot rest or have my feet swinging like a kid. Other than that, the table is working out great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Elegant. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I typically wouldn’t write a review on a desk. But this desk is amazing. It is simple. Elegant. And perfect for my gaming pc setup. It is the perfect size to fit my 24” monitor, ten keyless keyboard, mouse pad, headphones with stand, and my desktop computer all on it. But the thing that sets this apart are the parts and tools it comes with along with instructions. They give you extra parts Incase you lose some and even a ratchet hex tool. Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolaos Zotos

customer_reviews.title: Nice table but 2 bolts dont line up underneath
customer_reviews.text: 2 bolts do not line up underneath on the left side to fasten the top to the supports . They absolutely will not go in . After one hour of assembly we need to return the table . Some compensation should be available for the hassle
customer_reviews.author: Fellen

customer_reviews.title: A nice looking simple desk that came packed very nicely. (...or: A Great Cheap Desk!)
customer_reviews.text: **Update: I've had this table for nearly a year and still going strong, great buy!** I purchased one of the most recent iterations of this desk last month (Aug.2018), despite former complaints from other customers, this desk came extremely well packed (despite being what I'd call a 'cheap' desk). I scoured the reviews for a simple and low cost desk (for use with my computers, Xbox, etc) and came upon this one; it looks good and is fairly sturdy, and also came well packaged - I had no damaged parts. :-) I got the dark brown/gray Espresso color and I really like it. Easy to put together and keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: WASTELAND RAVENTop Contributor: Board Games

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: The table arrived without instructions or hardware to assemble. After 2 trips to the hardware store and over $20 later we were able to get the table assembled with only one small damage to the top because we bought screws at first that were a tad too long. Although that is very frustrating the table itself seems fine. It is not the highest quality and is possibly worth less than what I paid for it. For a computer/school desk for my son it will do the job but I am not sure how long will last with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The computer desk had manufacturer's defects. The holes on one side were too small to fit the side legs. The entire metal parts had scratches - it looks like someone already tried to build it and gave up and returned. Very disappointing. Zinus was one of my proffered companies.
customer_reviews.author: Justa_girl619

customer_reviews.title: Nice table, nice material, finicky assembly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table and awesome color. The table doesn't seem to be made of wood, I can't really tell what it's made it but it appears to just be painted-on wood texture. Assembly seemed easy and they give you all the tools, but a lot of the screw holes weren't lining up, making it frustrating. Also you have to use brute Force for some of the assembly so it was awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lauriano

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging, nice simple table
customer_reviews.text: This table got delivered in a downpour and the cardboard overwrap was almost disintegrating, but everything was wrapped so well that nothing was damaged (the tabletop wasn't even wet). It was so easy to put together (the wrench they send is great), on my own without much effort. It's not too heavy, not too bulky. I needed to set up a workstation in my dining room, and this worked perfectly. I can fit an all-in-one, another monitor, and a couple small peripherals comfortably, with a little room for my daughter to also have her laptop on the table while she's working (that's a little crowded, but possible). Great, cheap table that looks nice, zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: I am using this desk in my craft room and it is way more sturdy than I expected. I am very happy with this desk overall. The top is made of a durable material and feels like it should hold up to a lot of crafting. The height is perfect to fit with my current ikea desk so I can scoot them together and have one mega desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines, expensive look, solid desk at value price
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier! Desktop looks like solid pine and is a solid weight. Comfortable with its weight bearing capability. Love the clean line and ability to put file cabinet underneath the desk so the desk remains the primary focus. So easy to assemble & instructions actually accurate! Have had many desks & this will be a favorite especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Best assembly ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest product I have ever assembled. It was packaged perfectly to keep the product from getting damaged and I was able to assemble it in about 15 min by myself. The surface had NO scratches, the screws went right into place. I live in a small studio apartment, will use as desk and as dinning table when needed. Love the size and surface space, took me a while to find something that can do double function, this is perfect. It is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D.

customer_reviews.title: This is just a great desk / table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a computer desk and its just perfect. Its the perfect size and dimensions. The top is laminated so its totally water proof. You don't need to worry about rings from cup or glass drinks. its extremely sturdy, fells pretty indestructible. It's definitely not real wood and looks like fake wood texture in person. It looks fine but it is not high end. This is not something I wanted or expected so I am not taking any stars off. But if you want a real wood table look elsewhere. This is a great desk table, extremely sturdy and well made. Feels like it could last 50 years. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STURDY, EASY TO ASSEMBLE, AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table. I have purchased multiple tables recently but I have been disappointed by them and had to return them. However, this table was just perfect. If you want to purchase a table look no more. It is very sturdy, easy to assemble(don't need to purchase any assembly equipment, everything is provided), affordable, and smooth on the screen. Currently, I have my laptop as well as a 22" monitor and a keyboard and mouse, and I have enough rooms to add another 15" laptop on the side. Great table. I Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: lrs

customer_reviews.title: FOUR STARS
customer_reviews.text: I've just furnished an entire apartment on Amazon, and I'm going to give honest reviews. Value doesn't just mean inexpensive. It's a combination of price and quality. I've found that almost every product on Amazon that's affordable gets close to five stars, and that's ridiculous. That's my opening statement from now on because Amazon is out of control. This is a pretty solid desk that's sleek, and fully supportive of all of my Mac video and audio gear. It's also a great price. I would give it five stars if it had a wire compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy minimalist desk at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple, medium sized desk for my desktop, and compared to some of the other options in this style, this one is much less expensive, but still sturdy. It looks nice and minimalist for sure. However, I'm sure some of the other desks like this probably have more realistic (or even just real) wood surfaces. For example, this desk (I got the dark surface) has a kind of speckly texture that reflects light in a distinct way that gives away that it is a synthetic laminate. It is certainly serviceable for my purposes, however, and if you're looking for a desk in this style that won't break the bank, this desk is definitely worth considering.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McAtee

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table. I have a guest staying with me for a while and I needed to setup a guest bedroom quickly. It is very sturdy, and it doesn't look cheap. This is definitely a good value product. It was simple to assemble, and it only took a few minutes. I am going to purchase another one for my office. Some of the reviews show photos of damaged corners. It appears that the manufacturer has rectified this matter. The packaging had extra reinforcements on the corners to prevent damage and mine was delivered flawless.
customer_reviews.author: SPB

customer_reviews.title: Convenient workspace, inexpensive and solid
customer_reviews.text: I needed some extra desk space for working on electronic projects. This desk was conveniently 29" high (same as my existing desk, so I don't need to adjust my chair height) and provides a solid, no-frills work surface with plenty of room underneath for file cabinets and such. Surface is reasonably durable but if you're doing work like cutting or soldering, you'll want a work mat of course. Assembly is super easy - they even included a ratchet driver which was a very nice touch. The assembly process does not require a lot of physical strength - all the parts are light.
customer_reviews.author: Lewin Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Pucker up Zinus
customer_reviews.text: I could literally kiss whoever made this allen wrench crank thing. Changing the game!! It does the click-click-click handle moving to position without taking allen wrench bit part out. (And it has a switch like on a drill to counter clock turn if needed) It took me about an hour to put together, super easy and new stickers for assembly too!! Honestly, it is same quality as other boxed assemble yourself furniture, however the new stickers and allen wrench are so clever and I am VERY IMPRESSED. 6 year old for scale. We are using it for school this year. Def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Karns

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction very good price, but a couple corners of top damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk/table and was extremely pleased with the price. The assembly was very easy and very sturdy. My one complaint is that the corners of the top were damaged in shipping. Not enough to return it, but enough that it doesn't feel brand new. This certainly is more of an issue with the shipping providers than the manufacturer, though perhaps they could do more in packaging to prevent it? Still very pleased with the purchase, and for the price would purchase again (hopefully getting an undamaged top next time).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: A lot could be said about the aesthetics of this desk, and it's build quality, but most importantly, it is EASY to put together! It looks beautiful once assembled and the assembly is a dream. Decent quality tools are included and as someone who puts together a lot of IKEA style furniture, this project was both quick and enjoyable. No cursing while trying to find parts, then struggling to get everything perfectly aligned. It came well packaged and protected, and has been fairly durable in the past month. No real downsides here, though some people might find the included instructions a bit lacking. If you're used to putting furniture together you should have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Hipple

customer_reviews.title: I am beyond satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond satisfied with this purchase. I wanted a large table that I could use as a work desk and this fit the bid perfectly. Ok so here are my thoughts: Pros: Looks better in person Extremely easy to put together Came with extra screws, just incase you somehow loose one Table had no scratches Cons: Took a week to get here (but well worth the wait so just be patient) All in all for the cost and quality this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: After having the first for some time, ordered another
customer_reviews.text: Great utility table, desk, tv stand, whatever you want it to be. Attractive and very sturdy. I have the Espresso at home and just ordered the Natural for my office (the Espresso wasn't available) and am surprised and pleased at how nice the natural veneer looks. 4-stars isn't really fair on my part at this price but it is because at least one of the legs on both units is (appears) slightly less than straight - it aligns perfectly with the tabletop holes for attachment but once you flip it and stand back you can see one of the legs (left based on my orientation and perspective) lean in.
customer_reviews.author: kly411

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 55-inch table and am using it as a computer desk. The desk has exceeded my expectations. It's very nice and solid, no wobbling at all. I put it together, by myself, in less than ten minutes. I'm sure it could be put together by two people in half that time. I chose Espresso and am definitely ordering the smaller version for my guest room's mini work area. It arrived with no damage, all of the tools needed were included. The instructions were very simple and easy to understand. The packaging can all go into the recycling bin. Very happy with my latest Zinus purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Toshiko R.

customer_reviews.title: Truly Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: First, the price when I bought this a couple of weeks ago was less than $89. I noticed it is now close to $200. At $89, it is the steal of the century. Everything about it, the packaging, the parts, the included tools, and the product itself are very high quality. It was amazingly easy to assemble and it is a rock solid table with no wiggle or sway. At $200, the quality is still worth it, but it seems like somebody is trying to take advantage. If you find this at a good price, buy it, you will definitely not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Soots

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown/described. Perfect addition for home office..
customer_reviews.text: Like... Very easy to assemble. Another person to help hold things in place made assembly even smoother. The product is just as described and shown. I got the 55" and it's perfect as a desk - very spacious and sturdy. Especially love that it came with screws and extras in a very convenient package, with all necessary tools as well. On top of that, it arrived in two days on free standard shipping, with no damage. Overall VERY impressed and will be buying again. Dislike... Nothing. If you want a roomy, affordable, well-built desk with simple/modern design, don't think twice.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando M.

customer_reviews.title: Goes together quick
customer_reviews.text: You never know what you're going to get when you buy furniture online, but this basic table/desk exceeded expectations. It went together extremely fast (slide the legs together, screw them to the desktop, and you're done), and it seems sturdy enough. It's kind of small to use as a dining table, but it will work just fine as a basic desk. As a nice added bonus, it included a ratcheting allen wrench in addition to the basic allen wrench this type of furniture normally comes with.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Laukkonen

customer_reviews.title: I Wish I Could Give More Than 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: With the recent shut down in our state, my husband and I have been working from home and our office situation was not cutting it. We ordered two and have them back to back with adjustable monitor arms and they are great! Plenty of room for all of our work, and my daughter can work next to me if she needs. It took us about 40 minutes to set up both, and they came with a very cool ratcheting hex wrench and blank cards, which was delightfully unexpected. I ordered these based on my experience with Zinus bed frames, which I also can't say enough good things about.
customer_reviews.author: vando

customer_reviews.title: Med Student Approved
customer_reviews.text: Great desk! Came very quickly and the corners were well protected, so no damage. Easy assembly. Clean look. 55" provides spacious destop. Perfect for studying. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: In Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my apartment. I use it as my office space. It’s incredibly spacious and has great leg room for me (5’5”) and my sister (5’8”); my dad, who is 6’1” could probably fit his legs under but he hasn’t tried it yet. It was ridiculously simple to put together! I did it by myself in 30 minutes with a basic Philips screw driver. Caution: the metal leg inserts are sharp metal so be careful when putting together, but the inserts disappear once the desk is fully assembled so you don’t have to worry about dangerous edges when working. This is genuinely one of my favorite pieces in my whole apartment!
customer_reviews.author: Dare Beard

customer_reviews.title: The product itself didn't live up to the quality they promise
customer_reviews.text: Though the desk was a joy when it first arrived, it didn't live up to the hype and the expectation. Assemble it was a breeze and they include all the tools plus drills you need for the job. The table itself got delivered quite nicely but upon inspection, there are major cracks along side of the table as well as imperfections on the corners as well. Zinius seems great overall with packaging and presentation but the product itself didn't live up to the quality they promise
customer_reviews.author: Hien & Bao

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern look!
customer_reviews.text: Putting the desk together was easy.I love the style - it has a sleek and modern look. The metal frame is sturdy and I am using it as my laptop/work desk. In addition to my laptop I have put mouse pad/mouse, lamp, few notebooks and coasters for my coffee. The lenght and width is great to have all items and still have some space to maneuver things around. I also bought Flash Furniture Mid-Back Dark Gray Mesh Multifunction Executive Swivel Chair with Adjustable Arms ( to go with my work table.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Solid table; a wee tricky to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Not all the parts fit easily together; so you will have to wiggle and use hammer to force them together. Also the real height of the space underneath is 28 inch tall; with the top its 29. Nice to see rounded edges for the top. Finding a large desk-mat for it is hard; so consider including it as an option when one buys. Now about the packaging, WOW, just wow. Someone must have worked at Apple. Clearly a lot of thought went into shipping the table. It was easy to unpack and clean up. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: A. Meit

customer_reviews.title: Good table/desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: One of the reasons I liked this simple design, was because the metal framing supports the entire work surface. So, I don't have to worry about the thin top sagging over time. It was very simple to assemble, although you do have to work to get a couple of the screw holes in the frame to line up with the ones in the top. Just don't tighten anything down, until you get it fully assembled. Everything came well packed and protected, and I like the way it looks in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be a sewing/student desk and I am so glad that I did. The dimensions are perfect for both. I have had this for over a year now and am still very happy with the product. When I purchased it I was concerned that it may not be sturdy enough for my when sew- the machine causes the table/desk to vibrate. But here I am a year later and no issues. I would strongly recommend this table and in fact if I need something for another room, would buy another!
customer_reviews.author: Wmjw2011

customer_reviews.title: CLEAN AND STURDY!
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like this table. Height is great. I use as a desk and the lack of a drawer is actually a blessing as I can cross my legs and not hit my knee up against a drawer. Base is made of iron that slips into itself, providing a solid base that doesn't wobble. The base would be a bit tricky to line up and slide into the appointed holes by yourself... recommend a helper for that. The top is screwed to the base using one of the niftiest tools I've received as part of a kit. The table top is durable and has a nice lustre finish. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: I Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Really solid little desk
customer_reviews.text: This is amazingly well built for the price or any price. It comes with spare parts, the parts it has are properly sorted, it's easy to assemble and even comes with a little rachet to make it easier than using an allen key. The top is obviously MDF with a veneer, but hey, it's $60. The metal frame is solid and while I was afraid it might wobble when I bought it, it is incredibly stable and well built. If I ever damage the top I'll make myself a hardwood replacement, because I love this table :)
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived damaged. Amazon handled the return well and I was sent a new one. It was easy to assemble. It's not fancy, but it's nicer than the paper thin veneer you get on the cheapest furniture. You won't confuse this will real wood up close, but it has a nice texture. When assembled the desk feels very solid and should have no trouble supporting heavy office equipment.
customer_reviews.author: ronparr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, solid, beautiful and spacious table perfect for decent home computer setup
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when ordering this preduct, as other has said the product was good, just a couple bent edges and scratches. It arrived with some small tears in the package but when opening the box, I saw everything was well packaged and there was absolutely no damage to the desk whatsoever. I love the simplicity and the look of this product, it only took me about 15 minutes assembling it and I took my time building it. Soft edges so there’s no discomfort, the material of the desk is smooth and easy to clean, and does not damage easy. I really really love that I went ahead and chose this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk
customer_reviews.text: The last desk I had was obnoxious to deal with. It had a hutch, drawers, etc. and it was near impossible to move between rooms, apartments, etc. if needed. This one is great. It doesn't have any drawers or bells and whistles, but it's a desk. It has legs and a top, what else do you need. And next time i move I can just take the legs off and get it into a car. Big fan. Good size top too. i use 3 monitors for work so this is a great size to expand my setup.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This table/desk is incredibly nice. The packaging was stellar and the materials are firm and sturdy, it doesn’t feel cheap at all. I’m using this desk as a temporary work desk for my laptop. It easily has room for the laptop, a monitor and a wireless keyboard/mouse. This desk doesn’t wobble or shake under normal use. One thing to note is my shipment did not include the floor pads that the manual states is included. So I used my own I had laying around.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Simple Fast Casual Restaurant Tables
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something this size to accommodate 4 people. I know it's main purpose is as a desk but I got the smaller one and it works just fine for eating on. Easy to put together, and came with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Girlinwashington

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk! It seems like really good quality for such a low price and i love the color combination of the light wood and white. Looks really clean and modern. The 55 inch is perfect size for a home office in my opinion! It was also really easy to assemble. Took me maybe 20 minutes from the time i opened the box to it being set up and it came with everything you need. I am not worried about the weight limit as my computer isn't heavy but if that's an issue for you, definitely double check that!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. There are instructions with photos but they aren't really necessary as everything is really intuitive. Came with one of those dinky Allen wrenches that most of these things come with but it also came with a mini Allen socket wrench thing that was a tremendous help and step up from the simple little ones. The underside from floor to bottom of the desk/table is just about 29.25 inches. I just mention that in case you're looking to fit something under it, like we did. It seems really sturdy and I don't have any complaints about it. I got two and am satisfied with both.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Borgstrom

customer_reviews.title: There is a god and her name is Zinus!
customer_reviews.text: The beautiful desk/table was so smooth to assemble. In the box was a RATCHING ALLEN WRENCH. This tool is so perfect that I am going to specify it in my will to my heirs. Prior to this arriving, I had recked my old hands' assembling two bookshelves, a dining table, and two chairs earlier this week. Then came this ratching allen wrench. It is so awesome. This table is also awesome. Absolutely no wobbles. The top has a nice texture to it so you don't stick to the top. The color is gorgeous. Did I mention this ratching allen wrench?
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: I love the tool they gave
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely well packaged. I love the tool they gave, love the thought put into the package sent out to customers. Esp with the cards given for you (customer) to send out to your friends, as a thank you gift from Zinus. They basically say "thinking of you", to send to whomever, on your own. Attach a personal message and a stamp! In a hugely tech world, tangible sentiments are important. Im glad this company has a brain n heart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT  product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent table! It arrived in great condition (securely packed, no scratches/imperfections). It took little time to assemble. It's sturdy. It looks great! And my 27" tall file drawer pedestal slid under it, to make it work perfectly as a desk. The instructions were very clear, very visual. In addition to providing all the items needed to assemble the table (that is, screws and Allen wrench), it also included extra screws and a small ratchet wrench (to use instead of the Allen wrench). The pieces fit together really well - everything slide into place, aligned and were easily fastened. I am so happy and impressed with this table!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Stable Frame, Strong Surface and Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This desk/table was extremely easy to put together, and is a great addition to my husband's home office. I really like the rectangular shape of the legs because it has more stability and doesn't wobble like other small tables of this size. Look at the storage space underneath!! Very convenient for storing file boxes, a lamp table or a chair can scoot underneath. Sorry to be so effusive, but I really love this table, so much so that I bought a second one for my son's room. I might even get one for me to use for a writing table/desk.
customer_reviews.author: FAH

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Desk
customer_reviews.text: This is the best option out there for this style of desk. I ordered another style* and the desk top came damaged. Also, the desk was wobbly and the edges were razor sharp - it hurt to lean against the desk edge! I bought this as a replacement. This desk came with no damage, was easy to assemble, is sturdy, and has smooth edges. I love it and strongly recommend it. * The other desk style I had ordered was "Zinus Jennifer Modern Studio Collection Soho Rectangular Dining Table / Table Only / Office Desk / Computer Table, White"
customer_reviews.author: The McDaniels

customer_reviews.title: All around satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Took me 20 min to put together (super easy), did it by myself and used the chairs to prop up the base pieces. It was well packaged with no damage, and it’s a great buy all around! I’m going to use it as a desk (just haven’t fully set the room up yet). Would be a great craft table! Love the clean look of it! They even sent little thank you cards (blank) for me to use (of course advertising on the back, but they really brand themselves well. Also- the little note hey include says a lot about their company culture- very authentic!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these desks, the black frame with wood grain top. My expectations were not very high, to be honest, but the parts were labeled clearly and fit together well. Very simple to assemble and ends up extemely sturdy. The top was not a scratchable surface like other cheap furniture. The best part was a set of blank cards included in the box telling telling the buyer that they appreciated them buying the product and to pass on the goodwill to others. Personal touch just made my day.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stoll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have a small apartment and I desperately needed a place for desk duties instead of sitting on my couch, slumped over trying to make a desk out of my lap sitting in Indian style. It was super easy to put together; took me about 35 minutes in total to connect the pieces. I am able to put my small printer, laptop and the basics on the desk. It is super sturdy and designed well. It is perfect for a small spaces or a home office. It is not cheaply made like some that you might run across on Amazon. All in all, this is a excellent buy for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal F.

customer_reviews.title: nice, but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to carry and put together. It took me about 10 minutes to assemble the desk however upon finishing assembly, I noticed that the corner of the desk top was damaged (that's why I gave 3 stars). I was upset to see this seeing I like the rest of the desk and how it looks after putting it all together. I would return it, but honestly, I need a desk so badly right now, I cant afford to wait for another one to come in or to take this one apart.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought the largest size and was able to put it together pretty quickly by myself while my husband was at work. I love the little Allen ratchet that comes with it (I use it for everything I can put together with it). The table is very sturdy without being bulky. We use it for homeschool and it’s large enough to accommodate my desktop computer, various file holders while we both sit side-by-side and work on lessons in the workbooks. I plan on buying another in the near future for an arts and crafts table.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaknows

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This desk is really easy to put together. The ratchet tool worked well. And I really like how the finished product does not look like something you had to put together yourself. The product is packed very well, and secured inside its box, which is good since the corner of the outside box had been ripped off in transit. I'm very happy with this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table!
customer_reviews.text: My expectations honestly weren't that high for this given the price point but let me tell you is it great! Very sturdy and modern, top wipes down wonderfully. It's a bit narrow if you're using it as a dining table, which for me was perfect since my dining room is the size of a postage stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Akins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and is pretty sturdy yet sleek, using as a desk, in the box is advertised as a dinning table which is hard to imagine for me because you couldn't tuck your chairs on the ends and it is too narrow for that, anyhow as desk or crafts table is perfect. I took one start off because the surface is different than any material I have had, and no matter how I clean it there are always streaks and you have to clean often than usual because even fingerprints show and that drives me crazy. If any one has a tip on how to clean it please share!
customer_reviews.author: Nena

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I have never assembled anything in my life and this assembly was pretty easy and straightforward. Came with all included pieces, even a screwdriver, so you don’t have to go out and buy a screwdriver. It took me about 40 minutes to set everything up. It’s a pretty sturdy desk, and it looks nice. I got a larger size to fill out the empty space in my room. I am pleased with my purchase and I’m sure you will be too. It even came with leg pads to put on the legs so that they don’t scratch your floor.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend unless you like wobbly, squeaky desks
customer_reviews.text: Cheap desk. The one I received had alot of wobble and metal squeaking. I took it apart and found the squeak came from one of the legs. Wobble is probably from it being on carpet but still feels like a flimsy desk. Product support was zero help. They just told me to return to Amazon but the box was so damaged I had to throw it away. So now stuck with a wobbly, squeaky desk with no support from Zinus. Would not recommend this product or the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy N.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight all round package
customer_reviews.text: The table is about 1/2” thick excluding the frame. The frame is easily scratch-able and the paint chips off. This table is extremely easy to assemble and the kit comes with all the necessary tools including a ratchet hex-screw which is kind of cool. If you have a hardwood floor, don’t worry, they include little stick pads in the kit for that occasion. This table is only meant for lightweight work, heavyweight work and work benches is not suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Lin

customer_reviews.title: This desk is sturdiness. It's the perfect size for my  24'  Dell monitor and  MacBook Pro 15.
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk. I bought this desk two months ago. After I used this desk for two months, I found this desk is really nice for working from home at the perfect price. I have one 24 inch Dell monitor, and one MacBook Pro 15 on this desk. It has enough space for my keyboard and mouse. I also spend one and a half hours for reading on this desk every day. All and all I am very happy with this desk. :)
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: OK price quality
customer_reviews.text: The desk is what I wanted. It is a super simple table that I use to put my stand up desk on. It was easy to assemble and very sturdy. The issue is that it came with a small crack on the top surface. Honestly I didn't want the hassle of of returning and getting another one, so I just kept it since I would be putting my stand up desk on it anyways and crack would not even be visible. Overall, without crack I would have given a 4 star rating, considering the great price.
customer_reviews.author: evelyn dieppa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I settled on this desk over others I've seen on Amazon. It's very sturdy and well made for a desk less than $100. My only complaint is that, unlike other people who purchased this desk, it took me quite awhile to put together. I found that the holes were all slightly off kilter, so it took a lot of adjusting to get all the screws in right. It was a little frustrating but in the end, it worked out. The desk doesn't wobble at all and supports my gaming PC just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Err

customer_reviews.title: Risky Buy?
customer_reviews.text: The finished product after assembly is pretty good. The process of building it was horrible. The metal bars that slide together took over 20 minutes of near abuse to get to fit, and after 10 minutes of trial and error, I found that at best only 7 out of 10 of the screws that hold the wood top and metal frame together would go in because of poor measurements. It seems plenty sturdy with only 7 screws but it is still very annoying. Maybe I just got a bad one. If you're willing to take the risk, the finished table looks nice and is sturdy. Can't recommend but I won't say don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Study table--Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time looking at study tables (perhaps too much) went with this one ultimately. No issues or complaints. I just have a monitor, laptop and few office products on it. It does the job well. The two issues that I saw that made me concerned pre-purchase: 1. Buyers complained about tightening the screw too much which caused the external surface to bulge so I was cautious in over-tightening. No problems there for me. 2. Some buyers complained about defective parts but no problems for me.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Company has QC Issues
customer_reviews.text: This is the second table I have bought since the other one was good enough (first one had a small scratch on top). So my package arrived three days late and as I was setting it up I noticed a Large scratch on top of the wood (each quarter marks the length of each scratch and on the underside a large denture. I don't know if this is a QC issue or I just got someone else's package but this is not acceptable as I'm paying full price for this!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy desk (55 inch)
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty skeptical about the table because the last time I ordered a table online it was so flimsy that I was afraid of even resting my head. Now, on this table, I can bang my head without having to worry about breaking it. I bought the 55 inch table and it is currently supporting my 7 pound laptop, a 30 pound huge monitor, and a few more pounds of stuff. It appears sturdy enough to support much more stuff. I will be likely be buying zinus stuff hereafter if I am buying them online.
customer_reviews.author: NMS

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great as a computer desk. Sticky pads for the bottom can easily be ripped off if moving the desk and legs sway a lot with a bit of force. A cat can scratch the top of this desk easily. I would buy this desk again since it's under $90 and even if it's iffy I have a monitor stand holding onto the frame which is why some people might avoid this desk for a computer setup, but it works!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for price
customer_reviews.text: I have two Monitors, 24" and 27", and a mid-sized tower. Those, Logitech speakers, a Logitech Orion keyboard, and a mouse fit on this desk great. I have room for wrist pads, a tablet, and put a small riser for a plant behind one of the monitors (which is at an angle). It's VERY easy to put together, and came with everything you need. It's also very sturdy and doesn't feel like some cheap particle board furniture. I've also had condensation from drinks on it, and I'm not experiencing any wear/tear/bubbling/etc on the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten H.

customer_reviews.title: Love the desk it’s really sturdy but giving it 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk it’s really sturdy but giving it 4 stars as it’s not perfectly balanced which is easy to fix and the little color plastic thing on one of the sides from the front was defective and therefore was like bent and not placed over the wood correctly anyways that was also fixed but just putting the bad side against the wall which isn’t even that notice when it’s not against the wall
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item 1 well before it shipped. When it arrives I was nervous the because the box was damn near destroyed, but much to my surprise the table was perfectly fine. Now, assembly was easy except there was a part that was hard to connect. But once that part got connected, everything was fine. Finally, all the screws didn’t connect, out of 10 screws I was able to insert 7. The last 3 couldn’t fit because the holes weren’t aligned. Nonetheless, the table is pretty sturdy and looks great in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Arrived DAMAGED and no help from Zinus who made me send them about 10 photos!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known this price was too good to be true. Arrived damaged. Metal legs could be bent by my 9 yr old! Metal parts do not fit into sockets they are supposed to. And 2 corners of the wood top were chipped. After an extensive exchange with the rep at Zinus where she spent about 20 minutes making me take and send her photos she said she could do NOTHING and I Had to contact Amazon. Thanks for wasting my time!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheap desk
customer_reviews.text: The quality is much better than I expected for the price. It is sturdy, stable, well made, and nice looking. It is the perfect cheap desk/table for a temporary living or when you are desperate for a desk space. It is not an object you will pass on to your children in your will, but an ideal solution right here and right now. Could not be better. Yes, I would buy this again if I need more desk space. Yes, I would recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: MeL

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell but so far its great!
customer_reviews.text: This desk does exactly what it's supposed to and looks good doing it. I am only 5' 10" and I wish it were a half inch shorter for my setup but at a standard 29" tall it will work for the average person splendidly. Will have to watch for possible bowing in the middle over time as I have two monitors and some decorative items sitting there. I usually don't lean on my desk but time will tell how this thing holds up. So far it's great and packaging came almost unharmed... luckily the desk was untouched.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Crews

customer_reviews.title: Simple, beautiful, quality...it’s just a great desk!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful, simple, quality desk! It was a breeze to put together because it’s so simple and well-made. It took me about 15 minutes not rushing. They even give you spare hardware...and label it “spare hardware” so you’re not left wondering if you missed something! The details make the difference. Even at a higher price point, I’d give it 5 stars, but I think it’s such a great deal at $80 (55-inch). I’ve never been happier to write a review. LOVE this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Beeay

customer_reviews.title: Love it soooo much!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing desk. It came wrapped and packed up well. Easy to assemble. No nicks or scratches. They also include 2 small gifts which was a great touch. I won't say, I will let you be surprised! Thanks Zunic for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret this purchase. It deserves 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! I am SO impressed with this desk and frankly the company. Now mind you, the box arrived damaged. But it was so well packed there was no damage to the desk itself. So it came with three note cards that you can mail off to whomever you please, I suppose as a thank you for buying with them. And not only were all the parts very well packaged and organized, it came with an Allan wrench RACHET. I mean... Talk about brownie points for that! Wow. Went together like a dream! Very very sturdy, looks sleek and clean in my space and the leg room is amazing. Not regretting my purchase AT all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Studdard

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to assemble; Great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed the packaging for this definitely put a great deal of love into it. Everything is individually-wrapped, including the styrofoam buffer. The instructions were easy to follow, and the assembly was simple. Zinus even provided a racket wrench. That's over-the-top dedication. So basically we're paying Ikea prices for a product that's 10x better than Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: HSuke

customer_reviews.title: Nice big desk
customer_reviews.text: Pro: - Well Built - Enough Space - Nice Color - Sturdy. I have monitor and PC on the desk and it has no problem holding it up. I even had two monitors once. Cons: - The surface is not completely smooth. If you write on a piece of paper on the desk than it will not be smooth. Though it feels smooth. For use everyday you will not feel it. I just happened to notice it because I was writing on a single A4 printer paper.
customer_reviews.author: Unubold

customer_reviews.title: Zinus is amazing value for your money!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Zinus bedframe and was super impressed with how sturdy it is and easy to assemble. I needed a desk and when I saw this one I figured it was the best option for the price. I was right! It is incredibly sturdy and very easy to put together. It is very sleek as well. Mine sits on carpet and it isn't wobbly at all. It is the perfect size for what I needed! I am normally all about Ikea furniture, but Zinus is definitely a great alternative if you don't have access to an Ikea. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light-weight, clean, spacious desk
customer_reviews.text: I needed to purchase a desk for my daughter to attend online classes. I purchased this desk, and although the packaging was a bit bulky (because it is a 55" desk), the desk was lightweight a very easy to assemble! The desk is very beautiful and clean. I cannot believe this desk is under $100. We chose it because of the simple legs and lines (as we have cabinets and outlets in the walls that we need to access), and this desk is perfect! I am very very happy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Liu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Super impressed with the quality of the desk for the price. Really easy to assemble. Took me less than 10 minutes from opening the box to finishing everything. Great for small spaces. Comes with everything you need. Looks cute. For sure worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: cc60537

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!!! You may be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this desk and the framing was out of alignment. Not only that, but so were the holes on the table. I had to return for a refund. I would never recommend this brand/desk. Expect to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Morgan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a lot of cheap desks and was not expecting much from this one, but the price was right. I was very surprised to find that not only is the desk itself great, but all the parts were very nicely packaged and organized. The areas you screw the legs into have threaded, metal inserts, so it can be taken apart and put back together, unlike other furniture in this price range where you screw directly into MDF board that falls apart if you ever try to remove them and reinsert. Very sturdy when put together, even on my carpet that seems to make everything wobble. Highly recommend this desk over others in this price range!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this piece as an addition to my home office. It arrived promptly and I was able to put it together by myself in just a few minutes. They actually provided a really nice ratcheting type tool to put it together along with your standard hex key thing. The top has the same look as my much more expensive bamboo adjustable desk though the texture is slightly different. It seems to be quite sturdy and doesn't make any noise when people are working on it.
customer_reviews.author: KCS

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy little gaming desk
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my gaming desk. It’s exactly what I wanted: a sturdy desk with no frills and no weird backing where my feet go. I despise assembling things, but this really was easy to put together; just some legs and a board and some bolts to screw in. No tiny pieces with a 20 step installation guide. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with huge crack across the top
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a huge (1 1/2 foot) crack spanning the width of the table. I had just taken it out of the box, which was heavily padded with foam, so it's hard to believe this happened during shipment. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, perfect workspace
customer_reviews.text: I needed a table to suit as a desk for a laptop, monitor, and later added some other hardware and a 3D printer. This is perfect for what I need. It is very sturdy, a great color, and was easy and quick to assemble. I had no issues with the desk as far as scratches/dents/dings. It probably isn't made of the nicest materials, but for what it cost I can't beat it. For reference, I bought this during a sale and it was ~$60.
customer_reviews.author: stingray2772

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried from reading other reviews about misaligned mounting holes etc, but luckily I've assembled quite a few of these to know NOT TO tighten the first set of screws before getting the rest at least threaded in partially. This gives you enough room to adjust for alignment. Overall quality is top notch for the price; assembles in 5 minutes or less. Just assembled another 2 for a kids corner.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey-Foxtrot

customer_reviews.title: Defect metal bar
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and has a solid build. Received low rating because of trouble installing. The edge of one of the top metal bar received is slightly longer. As such it took a lot of effort (and hammering) to get it in. Once in, it causes one leg to bend so much as the alignment for srews are completely off. Would want to return/replace but it would take too much effort to take them apart as those two misaligned pieces wouldn't easily go off. Still usable but will one leg and corner visibility different from others.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: great desk
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviewers have stated, this is a solid desk. Was a little surprised at the sturdiness of the components. The metal is actually pretty nice brushed metal, and felt thick and sturdy. The top is of course not real wood, but it feels solid and looks nice. You can't beat this for 100 nucks. If you were construction inclined you could buy a few planks from lowes and create your own nice desk with the frame, just find screws to fit. That's what i was planning on doing but the top was nice enough that i felt i could keep it.
customer_reviews.author: atma

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Table! Getting another soon!
customer_reviews.text: Used this table for a few years now and I love it! It’s my main work desk and I would spend hours at the computer with this desk with no complaints! I intend on buying another matching one for my wife soon! My table has been through 3 moves now and soon to be another and there is zero sign of scratches from travel. Assembly is quick and easy. Table is super strong. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Macfarlane

product_meta.title: Zinus Jennifer Modern Studio Collection Soho Rectangular Dining Table / Table Only / Office Desk / Computer Table, White
product_meta.description: Size:55 Inch| Color:WhiteThe Zinus modern Studio collection is an ideal combination of function and style. The Soho rectangular table is sturdy, with black steel tubing and a surface panel with rich white finish. The modern Studio collection Soho table will add an elegant touch to any décor. Easy to assemble. Worry free limited 1 year warranty.
feature_bullets: Sturdy Steel frame with rich Espresso Finish
Table dimensions 55 Inches x24 Inches x29 Inches
Table only, does not include chairs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,630 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
